text: UPDATE, WRITETHRU with more detail : Shortly before he was due to appear on ITV ’ s Good Morning Britain today, Ewan McGregor pulled out of the interview, citing comments made about this weekend ’ s Women ’ s March by host Piers Morgan. A supporter of President Donald Trump, Morgan yesterday on the program described some of the women who marched as “ rabid feminists ” and said he didn ’ t “ see the point of the march ( es ) ” which he called “ generic ” and “ vacuous. ” On Twitter this morning, McGregor, who is out promoting Trainspotting sequel T2 : Trainspotting, wrote, “ Was going on Good Morning Britain, didn ’ t realise Piers Morgan was host.
